data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 61 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Zabul.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zabul, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Zabul to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Zabul access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Zabul.
Lord, remember the Tirahi people. Make the Tirahi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Zabul.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Zabul to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Zabul.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

location.name: Zabul
location.cities_list: Qalāt, ‘Alāqahdārī Aṯghar, Shahr-e Şafā, ‘Alāqahdārī Shāh Jōy, Sāyagaz
